item.title: Flytipping, 10th October
item.description:
There was more originally including a vacuum and metal base and suitcase. Seems to be regular thing now at this spot. Boxes dumped earlier in week, then before that electric fan and kids toy pushchair. I suspect recent house sale people moving close by.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Bouncers Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Pothole in road, Elderly father fell in the road and required a visit to A&E, 10th October
item.description:
Tobyfield Road Bishops Cleeve, my Father was crossing from Bishops Close to go to the shops (co-op/ butcher/ norths bakery ) he fell in the road cutting open his hands and knees, a driver stopped and helped him up. There are two potholes next to each other, many people cross the road here to go to the shops.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tobyfield Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover sinking, 10th October
item.description:
Manhole cover on junction of church road and shurdington road has sunk an inch or two over recent weeks. Sufficient that I now actively avoid driving over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No timetables on new Bus Stops., 10th October
item.description:
New bus stops to left of Sunnyfield Lane on main road are much better and in a much safer location than old one's to right of Roundabout at Cold Pool Lane. Old stops in unsafe location have been removed but some 97 and 98 Stagecoach buses still stopping at old location. New stop has had timetable boards put up for one month now but still no timetables on them, leading to confusion for passengers and bus Driver's alike. Contacted Stagecoach Customer services yesterday, who's call centre is in Scotland, and they do not have access to mapping system's to pinpoint location, despite Postcode and name of location being given, as not a timing point and, therefore, not on Driver Duty boards. They state it is County Council responsibility to place timetables. Please get this sorted if you wish public to make use of, much better, service's, particularly for many elderly residents of Sunnyfield Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cold Pool Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
